Header: Promoted Senior Officer Welcomed in His Division HQ
Content: In conformity with military traditions, Major General H.H.A.S.P.K Senarathne, General Officer Commanding, 53 Division was greeted to a Guard Turnout and a parade when he arrived at the HQ upon receipt of his promotion as Major General on Thursday (6). To mark this event, he planted a sapling in the premises and joined refreshments with All Ranks.
